

# final-year-project

## Project setup
```
npm install
```

### Compiles and hot-reloads for development
```
npm run serve
```

### Compiles and minifies for production
```
npm run build
```

### Lints and fixes files
```
npm run lint
```

### Customize configuration
See [Configuration Reference](https://cli.vuejs.org/config/).




@2022
Accessibility in web applications using front-end frameworks
Goldsmiths, University of London
Victoria Szydlowska

REFERENCES:
Code was written based on official Tailwind CSS [35] and Vue JS [20] documentation. If there was any code copied and/or used from other source, it was acknowledged within the code and references were provided in academic paper and README file available.
